as for the last few lines of the movie, the russian parts....gabriel tells michael to kill him (do it! do it!). then he says "but i gave him what he wanted" and michael replies "and that is why you failed him".  michael then tells the young man (Jeep or Jeeeb or whatever his name is) to get the child to safety that he doesn't have much time.  he says he doesn't know how and michael says "have faith".  then the last voice over part where the girl is speaking as they drive off down the road is exactly what she said in the first minute of the movie about her mom and god being mad at his children.
so quit bitching about 27 seconds of audio, now you know exactly what was said.
